name: Wind Digger
description:
Dream Grenade Games was founded by Game Design students, Jordan Funk & Jean-Luc St-Pierre. The studio is currently working on a vertical slice of their first title, Wind Digger, as a final assignment. The project is being made available to the public for Beta testing to gather feedback and help make Wind Digger accessible by all levels of players. 

Your honest feedback and suggestions is very much appreciated and will help shape the final quality of this project, and potentially shape the direction of the project in the future! 

Thank you for taking the time to play our Beta demo! Follow our development on Twitter or our website:

https://www.dreamgrenade.com/wind-digger

https://twitter.com/DreamGrenade

Dream Grenade Games is:

  • Jean-Luc St-Pierre - Lead Game & Narrative Designer, Producer, 2D Pixel Artist
  • Jordan Funk - Programmer, Game Designer, Assembly, 2D Pixel Artist
  • Eli Galvez - 3D Modelling & Texture Artist
  •  Frank Castel - Illustrator
  •  Annie Huylenbroeck - Composer 

******* ATTENTION ****************************************

This build is currently in its BETA phase. Some assets are temporary/unfinished, and you may encounter a bug or two, or unpolished features. As well, the mac version has not been properly tested, so it may be unstable. If you do encounter any issues, we would be much appreciated if you could lets us know about them, and how you felt about the game in general by filling out this survey:

 https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/JRX3NST

Thanks! 

Dream Grenade

*************************************************************
